entry.title: Thursday: Chance of drizzle. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 21 April 2016
